title: FT/FS: T3 Krause checklist PSA 1 - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: T3 Krause checklist PSA 1 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade this T3 Krause for T206 or caramel cards, preferably graded. Otherwise I would be asking $SOLD

Card is nice except for the front paper loss. There is also a scratch on the case on the lower right.

[IMG]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1846/44733281842_d8a6562b5b.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1894/30912307178_12a7c9e016.jpg[/IMG]
